name: Apple Pie
notes: (Tabantha Wheat, Cane Sugar & Goat Butter obtainable in Rito Village)

name: Meat Pie
notes: You can use any raw meat or poultry, but gourmet meat restores the most hearts.

name: Fruit Pie
notes: Swap Wildberry for other fruit (such as Palm Fruit) for different results. Adding another fruit amplifies the healing effect.

name: Monster Cake
notes: restores 5 hearts during the Blood Moon

name: Nutcake
notes: The acorn can be swapped for chickaloo tree nuts

name: Fruit cake
notes: Always use two different fruits in this cake. You may switch the apples or wildberries for other fruits to add special effects.

name: Carrot Cake
notes: Use only one type of carrot to add a special effect

name: Egg Pudding
notes: Add extra ingredients to give it special effects or to increase the hearts restored

name: Mushroom risotto
notes: Use other or more mushrooms to increase hearts restored. Switch the Mushrooms for Hearty Salmon to get a fish lover's dish
